content: My mental faculties remained in suspended animation while I obeyed the orders of the higher-ups. This is typical with everyone in the military.
translations: ita:Le mie facoltà mentali rimanevano in animazione sospesa mentre obbedivo agli ordini dei superiori. Questo è tipico di tu
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Spamster (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
